| History                 = THe '''Warders''' are a group of [[Demons#Class Three Demons|third-ranked demons]] devoted to bringing about the end of the world and fighting against anyone who would prevent or avert the apocalypse.{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 248}}

Most Warders simply possess [[Homo sapiens|human]] hosts, but more advanced Warders can [[Shape-Changer|shape-shift]] within their hosts.{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 224.1}}{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 249}} Collectively, Warders are connected to several Hell Dimensions.{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 249}}

Led by [[Vera (Warders) (Earth-616)|Vera]], a group of Warders ushered in the [[Hell on Earth War]] with the arrival of the [[Hell Lords (Earth-616)|Hell Lords]]. Although the Warders were killed by [[X-Factor Investigations (Earth-616)|X-Factor]], the Hell Lords were brought to [[Earth]].{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 248|249}}
